about_the_game:
TARGET is an action-packed, Multiplayer game where players take control of miniature toy tanks and
engage in intense battles with each other. The game is set in a variety of environments, from living rooms
to backyards, or as far as to what your mind can produce.

Players can choose from a variety of toy tanks, each with its own unique set of abilities and weapons.
Some tanks are nimble and agile, allowing players to outmaneuver their opponents, while others are
heavily armored and can withstand a lot of damage, so be wise as each choice makes a difference to aid
your chance of victory.

One of the key features of TARGET is its multiplayer mode, which allows players to compete against each
other online or locally. Players can team up with friends or join forces with other players to take on other
teams in intense tank battles.

The game also features a variety of different game modes, such as deathmatch, capture the flag, and
Free for All, each offering a unique challenge and requiring different tactics to succeed.

With its fast-paced gameplay, intuitive controls, and stunning visuals, "Target" is a game that is sure to
keep players engaged and entertained for hours on end. So, grab your toy tank, take aim, and get ready
for the battle of a lifetime!
detailed_description:
JOIN OUR DISCORD


About the Game

TARGET is an action-packed, Multiplayer game where players take control of miniature toy tanks and
engage in intense battles with each other. The game is set in a variety of environments, from living rooms
to backyards, or as far as to what your mind can produce.

Players can choose from a variety of toy tanks, each with its own unique set of abilities and weapons.
Some tanks are nimble and agile, allowing players to outmaneuver their opponents, while others are

One of the key features of TARGET is its multiplayer mode, which allows players to compete against each

The game also features a variety of different game modes, such as deathmatch, capture the flag, and

With its fast-paced gameplay, intuitive controls, and stunning visuals, "Target" is a game that is sure to

name: Target

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E8200 2.66 GHz or AMD Phenom X3 8750 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 8800GT 512 MB or ATI Radeon HD 3870 512 MB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11.0c compatible
  • Additional Notes: Broadband connection required for multiplayer gameplay
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I5-4440 3,10 GHz
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX650
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: TARGET is an action-packed, Multiplayer game where players take control of miniature toy tanks and engage in intense battles with each other. The game is set in a variety of environments, from living rooms to backyards, or as far as what your mind can produce.
